content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day December 18, 2017 Interview with a Botnet Hunter December 18, 2017 In this interview, Cyren botnet expert Geffen Tzur explains how botnets work and gives a view from the trenches on successes and challenges in fighting botnet cybercrime. What defines a botnet? Doesnt all malware phone home?
